questions.text: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Feeling tired or having little energy
Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure
Moving or speaking slowly or being fidgety or restless
Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself

safety_note: Any non-zero response to item 9 should prompt immediate support guidance.
disclaimer: This is a screening tool only and not a diagnostic instrument.
